title: The Christian case for backing Israel
message:
Home Opinion The Christian case for backing IsraelThe Bible vividly portrays Israel as a central theme in God's plan for humanity.
But what does it mean to say we support Israel in today’s geo-political climate?
I agree with my colleague, Dr. Jeff Myers, president of Summit Ministries and author of Should Christians Support Israel?
Clearly, through the prophet Isaiah, God chose Israel to be a beacon of hope, truth, and divine revelation to the entire world.
By supporting Israel, we are obeying God's will and aligning ourselves with His promises, purposes, and plans for the world.

title: Did the united kingdom government fuel race riots with close border push ?
message:
Before winning a landslide victory last month, the Labour Party said the country does need to offer asylum to those fleeing war or persecution.
However, both the Labour Party and the then-governing Conservative Party campaigned on bringing down immigration and stopping boats of migrants and asylum seekers crossing into the UK.
